articles.author: PTI
articles.title: PCB demands compensation from ACC for losing Asia Cup matches out of Pakistan - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Lahore, Sep 6 (PTI) The Pakistan Cricket Board on Wednesday demanded compensation from the Asian Cricket Council for the loss of gate money it has suffered due to Asia Cup matches being held in Sri Lanka.
articles.content: Although the PCB has not issued any official statement on the matter, some media outlets here have reported that the boards chairman Zaka Ashraf has sent a formal letter to the ACC president Jay Shah… [+24 chars]

articles.author: https://www.cnbctv18.com
articles.title: Scrub Typhus claims 5 lives, 700 infected: All you need to know about the infectious disease - CNBCTV18
articles.description: According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the cases of scrub typhus are typically common in rural areas of Southeast Asia, India, Indonesia, China, Japan, and northern Australia.
